top_tweets.text: If you’re in #India - The next time you order a take away from @swiggy_in or @zomato spare a thought for the driver who delivered your dinner. A powerful and thought provoking watch from the brilliant @Anshul_Verma__ https://t.co/GLCSzlTwfe
